ygData.subject: Re: Need info for JBoot camping
ygData.msgSnippet: I got to key to najena room in my bank and drezelna spawns the boot from my experience there boot spawns about 6 hours the spawn goes like this every 15
ygData.messageBody:
I got to key to najena room in my bank and drezelna spawns the boot from my
experience there boot spawns about 6 hours the spawn goes like this every 15
minutes 2 necros will spawn their level range from 23-26 then after u kill them
15 minutes later drez will spawn the cycle in like that la. sometimes a lvl 22
ogre named moosh and tentacle whip will come to attack u ppl in room also so
careful :) if u need guide to the room to drez i will gladly help. Chow oh and
ya if u need to keys just msg me i pass u.

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> May I know which mob carry the key to Jboot room? Where can I find it?
> What lvl is the mob carrying the key and does it has other guard mobs also
> (what lvl if yes)?
>
> How abt the room tat drops Jboot? What mobs and lvl inside? I heard tat
> room is tougher than Najena room (of coz Najena herself is still the
> toughest mob in the dungeon) due to those necro guards which can charm
> players. What other artifacts can we find in the room?
>
> All info welcome, thx.
>
> Ziltus
